00033 TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler::TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler(
00034     Comm *comm, time_t timeout)
00035   : m_outstanding(0), m_client(comm, timeout) {
00036 }
00037 
00038 TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler::~TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler() {
00039   map<String, InetAddr *>::iterator iter = m_pending_addrs.begin();
00040   for(;iter != m_pending_addrs.end(); ++iter) {
00041     delete iter->second;
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 void TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler::add(const String &addr_str) {
00046   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00047   InetAddr *addr = new InetAddr(addr_str);
00048 
00049   try {
00050     m_pending_addrs[addr_str] = addr;
00051     m_client.commit_log_sync(*addr, this);
00052     m_outstanding++;
00053   }
00054   catch (Exception &e) {
00055     ErrorResult result;
00056     result.addr = *addr;
00057     result.error = e.code();
00058     result.msg = "Send error";
00059     m_errors.push_back(result);
00060   }
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 void TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00065   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00066   ErrorResult result;
00067   String addr_str;
00068 
00069   if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00070     if ((result.error = Protocol::response_code(event_ptr)) != Error::OK) {
00071       result.addr = event_ptr->addr;
00072       result.msg = Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr);
00073       m_errors.push_back(result);
00074     }
00075     else {
00076       // Successful response
00077       addr_str = InetAddr::format(event_ptr->addr);
00078       if (m_pending_addrs.erase(addr_str) == 0) {
00079         String expected_addrs;
00080         map<String, InetAddr *>::iterator iter;
00081 
00082         for(iter=m_pending_addrs.begin(); iter != m_pending_addrs.end();
00083             ++iter) {
00084           expected_addrs += "'" + iter->first + "' ";
00085         }
00086         HT_FATAL_OUT << "Received 'commit log sync ack' from unexpected addr '"
00087             << addr_str << "' expected one of " << expected_addrs << HT_END ;
00088       }
00089     }
00090   }
00091   else {
00092     result.error = event_ptr->error;
00093     result.addr = event_ptr->addr;
00094     result.msg = "";
00095     m_errors.push_back(result);
00096   }
00097   m_outstanding--;
00098 
00099   if (m_outstanding == 0)
00100     m_cond.notify_all();
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 void TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler::retry() {
00105   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00106   map<String, InetAddr *>::iterator iter;
00107 
00108   try {
00109     m_errors.clear();
00110     for(iter=m_pending_addrs.begin(); iter != m_pending_addrs.end(); ++iter) {
00111       m_client.commit_log_sync(*(iter->second), this);
00112       m_outstanding++;
00113     }
00114   }
00115   catch (Exception &e) {
00116     ErrorResult result;
00117     result.addr = *(iter->second);
00118     result.error = e.code();
00119     result.msg = "Send error";
00120     m_errors.push_back(result);
00121   }
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 bool TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler::wait_for_completion() {
00126   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00127   while (m_outstanding > 0)
00128     m_cond.wait(lock);
00129   return m_errors.empty();
00130 }

00132 
00133 void TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler::get_errors(vector<ErrorResult> &errors) {
00134   errors = m_errors;
00135 }
